channel.title: Hugo-tufte Theme Example Site
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo-tufte Theme Example Site

item.title: Hugo-Tufte Features
item.description:
This is a quick demonstration post. It serves as an example of the features of this theme. One of them is $ \LaTeX $ via Katex.

A Bit About Mathematics

This is an example of an epigraph with some math $ \mathbb N \subseteq \mathbb R $ to start the beginning of a section.

Shawn O'Hare, Math is Fun

item.title: Hide Date
item.description: Here is an example post where the date set, but hidden from display. Moreover, the reading time is also hidden.
